original_text: I am so upset! My body is shaking with pain. My heart beats hard inside me. I cannot keep still. I cannot keep quiet. I have heard the noise of the enemy's trumpets and the shouts of their soldiers. I am so upset! My body is shaking with pain. My heart beats hard inside me. I cannot keep still. I cannot keep quiet. I have heard the noise of the enemy's trumpets and the shouts of their soldiers. I am so upset!
korean_text: 슬프고 아프다 내 마음속이 아프고 내 마음이 답답하여 잠잠할 수 없으니 이는 나의 심령이 나팔 소리와 전쟁의 경보를 들음이로다

sentences.original_text: My body is shaking with pain.
My heart beats hard inside me.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 마음은 내 안에서 강하게 뛰고 있다.

sentences.original_text: I have heard the noise of the enemy's trumpets
and the shouts of their soldiers.
